TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IPv4InterfaceProperties extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供有关支持 Internet 协议版本 4 (IPv4) 的网络接口的信息。

span.span: Provides information about network interfaces that support Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类提供对配置和地址信息的支持 IPv4 的网络接口的访问。This class provides access to configuration and address information for network interfaces that support IPv4. 不创建此类; 的实例它们由返回方法。You do not create instances of this class; they are returned by the method. 有关 IPV6 属性，请参阅。For IPV6 properties, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取对象，并显示其数据。The following code example gets an object and displays its data. [!code-cpp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#48)] [!code-csharp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#48)] [!code-vb[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#48)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数可以调用仅由派生自的类。This constructor can be called only by classes that derive from .

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Index As Integer
public: abstract property int Index { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取 Internet 协议版本 4 (IPv4) 地址的网络接口的索引。

span.span: Gets the index of the network interface associated with the Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4) address.

value.span: 包含 IPv4 接口索引的 。

span.span: An that contains the index of the IPv4 interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性的值为零，通过此接口不支持 IPv4。If the value of this property is zero, IPv4 is not supported by this interface. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取对象，并显示其数据。The following code example gets an object and displays its data. [!code-cpp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#48)] [!code-csharp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#48)] [!code-vb[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#48)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsAutomaticPrivateAddressingActive As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsAutomaticPrivateAddressingActive { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个 值，该值指示此接口是否具有自动专用 IP 寻址 (APIPA) 地址。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether this interface has an automatic private IP addressing (APIPA) address.

value.span: 如果此接口使用 APIPA 地址，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the interface uses an APIPA address; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自动专用 IP 寻址允许没有访问带有公共地址不冲突的 IP 地址自动分配的动态主机配置协议 (DHCP) 服务器的计算机。Automatic private IP addressing allows computers that do not have access to a Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP) server to be automatically assigned an IP address that does not conflict with public addresses. 这些地址是 169.254.0.0 到 169.254.255.255 中。These addresses are in the range 169.254.0.0 to 169.254.255.255. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取对象，并显示其数据。The following code example gets an object and displays its data. [!code-cpp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#48)] [!code-csharp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#48)] [!code-vb[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#48)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsAutomaticPrivateAddressingEnabled As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsAutomaticPrivateAddressingEnabled { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个 值，该值指示此接口是否启用了自动专用 IP 寻址 (APIPA)。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether this interface has automatic private IP addressing (APIPA) enabled.

value.span: 如果此接口使用 APIPA，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the interface uses APIPA; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自动专用 IP 寻址允许没有访问带有公共地址不冲突的 IP 地址自动分配的动态主机配置协议 (DHCP) 服务器的计算机。Automatic private IP addressing allows computers that do not have access to a Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP) server to be automatically assigned an IP address that does not conflict with public addresses. 这些地址是 169.254.0.0 到 169.254.255.255 中。These addresses are in the range 169.254.0.0 to 169.254.255.255. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取对象，并显示其数据。The following code example gets an object and displays its data. [!code-cpp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#48)] [!code-csharp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#48)] [!code-vb[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#48)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsDhcpEnabled As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsDhcpEnabled { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个 值，该值指示此接口是否配置为使用动态主机配置协议 (DHCP) 服务器来获取 IP 地址。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the interface is configured to use a Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP) server to obtain an IP address.

value.span: 如果此接口配置为从 DHCP 服务器获取 IP 地址，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the interface is configured to obtain an IP address from a DHCP server; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性是`true`，DHCP 服务器将 IP 地址分配给该接口时在计算机建立其网络连接。When this property is `true`, a DHCP server assigns the IP address to the interface when the computer establishes its network connections. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取对象，并显示其数据。The following code example gets an object and displays its data. [!code-cpp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#48)] [!code-csharp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#48)] [!code-vb[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#48)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsForwardingEnabled As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsForwardingEnabled { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个 值，该值指示此接口是否可以转发（路由）数据包。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether this interface can forward (route) packets.

value.span: 如果此接口可以路由数据包，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this interface routes packets; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果禁用了路由，不保留由接口的目标地址与接口接收的数据包将被丢弃。If routing is disabled, packets that are received by the interface with a destination address that is not held by the interface are discarded. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取对象，并显示其数据。The following code example gets an object and displays its data. [!code-cpp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#48)] [!code-csharp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#48)] [!code-vb[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#48)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Mtu As Integer
public: abstract property int Mtu { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取此网络接口的最大传输单位 (MTU)。

span.span: Gets the maximum transmission unit (MTU) for this network interface.

value.span: 用于指定 MTU 的 值。

span.span: An value that specifies the MTU.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 网络接口的 MTU 是可以传输的最大数据包。The MTU of a network interface is the largest packet that can be transmitted. 它的单位为八位字节 （8 位字节为单位）。It is measured in octets (8-bit bytes). ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取对象，并显示其数据。The following code example gets an object and displays its data. [!code-cpp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#48)] [!code-csharp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#48)] [!code-vb[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#48)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property UsesWins As Boolean
public: abstract property bool UsesWins { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取 值，该值指示接口是否使用 Windows Internet 名称服务 (WINS)。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether an interface uses Windows Internet Name Service (WINS).

value.span: 如果接口使用 WINS，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the interface uses WINS; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks WINS 提供了一个分布式的数据库，用于注册和查询 IPv4 地址映射到的动态 NetBIOS 名称。WINS provides a distributed database for registering and querying dynamic NetBIOS names to IPv4 address mappings. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取对象，并显示其数据。The following code example gets an object and displays its data. [!code-cpp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#48)] [!code-csharp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#48)] [!code-vb[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#48)]
